name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in backend technologies, integrating **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Postgres** to develop scalable and efficient financial products. I am proficient in working with **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration, ensuring seamless deployments and high availability. My focus on Test-Driven Development (TDD) enables the delivery of robust and maintainable code, while my knowledge of databases like **MongoDB** and **Cassandra** allows me to design and implement effective data storage solutions.
In addition to my backend expertise, I have a strong foundation in machine learning, leveraging it to enhance product functionality and drive data-driven decisions. I have led initiatives integrating machine learning capabilities and possess solid mathematical skills that support analytical reasoning and problem-solving. My strong communication skills facilitate collaboration within teams and ensure accountability and ownership across projects, contributing to successful outcomes in dynamic environments.
